products.title: Burst Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burst ocean green vertical blind
products.productdescription: Say aloha to this beautiful emerald blind that is even better than bobbing in a turquoise green ocean. Can a remote chain of tropical islands stop people from looking into your window? Could a the ocean, no? Well this beautiful fabric can do that with ease, and while it does so it floods the room in a beautiful greeny-teal glow that bathes the soul like the warm waters of the pacific. Combining it with other earthy colours is a sure-fire way of creating a space which heals and relaxes before you return to the stresses and distractions of real life.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.productdescription:
This luscious bella blackout vine green vertical blind brings cooling splash of green to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office! Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This gorgeous green vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
